definition: 10th earthly branch: 5-7 p.m., 8th solar month (8th September-7th October), year of the Rooster/ancient Chinese compass point: 270° (west)
soldier/servant/to finish/to die/finally/at last/pawn in Chinese chess
to be infatuated with/to be drunk with/to be enchanted with/to revel in
lit. as if drunk and stupefied (idiom)/fig. intoxicated by sth/obsessed with/mad about sth

wine-lover's heart is not in the cup (idiom); a drinker not really interested in alcohol/having an ulterior motive/to have other things in mind/with an ax to grind/accomplishing something besides what one set out to do
pinyin: zui4 weng1 zhi1 yi4 bu4 zai4 jiu3

definition: dead drunk/as drunk as a lord

sentences.english: I ain't so very drunk, Melly.
sentences.chinese: 我並沒有那麼醉，梅勒妮。

sentences.english: No, thanks, I'm a bit tipsy.
She gets pretty drunk and stumbles home in the wrong direction.
sentences.chinese: 她很醉，跌跌撞撞的回家，卻弄錯了方向。

sentences.english: Therefore hear now this, thou afflicted, and drunken, but not with wine
sentences.chinese: 因此，你這困苦卻非因酒而醉的，要聽我言。

sentences.english: Fluttering red smile, only for the drunk.
sentences.chinese: 隨風飄搖紅塵一笑，只爲醉逍遙。

sentences.english: Both of us were drunk on something more than the bottle of soju.
sentences.chinese: 我們倆都醉了，不僅僅因這那瓶韓國白酒。

sentences.english: I feel good when I am drunk, because I can tell you what I think in my heart.
sentences.chinese: 懸賞醉了的感覺真好，能對你說心裏話。漢譯英？

sentences.english: Million account Qionglu drunk, shadow star shake and crumble.
sentences.chinese: 千軍萬帳中酣歌豪飲人早已醉，滿天繁星搖搖欲墜。

sentences.english: Senor Dahlmann, don't pay any attention to those lads; they're half high.
sentences.chinese: 達爾曼先生，那些小夥子醉了，別理他們。

sentences.english: I think that Jed is permanently dipsy.
sentences.chinese: 我看傑德是醉死過去了。

sentences.english: Any dispute doesn't matter as a cloud high.
sentences.chinese: 百年渾似醉，是非一片雲。

sentences.english: Oneself are beautiful, said, flower flower also is drunk, why attached to an end?
sentences.chinese: 己說，花開是美，花落亦是醉，何必執着於一種結局？

sentences.english: How can anyone get so drunk on one and a half martinis?
sentences.chinese: 怎麼會有人只喝一杯半馬丁尼就醉了？

sentences.english: Grass River desolately drunk, who turned into tears of a thousand lines.
sentences.chinese: 悽悽芳草河邊醉，化作誰人淚千行。

sentences.english: The book On Nude Art written by Chen Zui was the bestseller of the year.
sentences.chinese: 陳醉《裸體藝術論》成爲當年的暢銷書。

sentences.english: He was pretty drunk, and the girl was about half crocked herself, and they were arguing.
sentences.chinese: 他有點醉，那姑娘也是半醉的樣子，他們正在辯論。

definition: to chant/to recite/to moan/to groan/cry (of certain animals and insects)/song (ancient poem)
see 清風明月|清风明月[qing1 feng1 ming2 yue4]
a beautiful woman/graceful and elegant posture/moon
bright moon/refers to 夜明珠, a legendary pearl that can glow in the dark/CL:輪|轮[lun2]
